ygData.subject: Re: What does Enthrall Do?
ygData.msgSnippet: It is an improved Mesmerize.  It holds their attention for about 30 secs instead of 15.  GREAT spell. I can keep off around 3 or 4 elite goblin guards in Runny
ygData.messageBody:
It is an improved Mesmerize. It holds their attention for about 30 secs
instead of 15. GREAT spell. I can keep off around 3 or 4 elite goblin
guards in Runny while the rest of the group fights the King or Warlord, then
we take them on one by one. VERY fun.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
